passages.text:
Seems that you learned more than I could teach you, congratulations.
[[Thank you, it was hard, but I think I made it]]

links.name: Thank you, it was hard, but I think I made it
links.link: Thank you, it was hard, but I think I made it

passages.name: First_level

passages.text:
Now, is about time to tell you about your pass
[[finally…]]
passages.name: Thank you, it was hard, but I think I made it

passages.text:
You must notice that you have that strange power of “respawn” after die.
[[Yeah…]]
passages.name: finally…

passages.text:
So, before loss your memory, you used that power to fight.
You where an extraordinary soldier.
[[me…?]]
passages.name: Yeah…

passages.text:
That’s right.
But one day… There was an incident…
[[...]]
passages.name: me…?

passages.text:
In a laboratory, some scientists where making an experiments with bugs.
But it got out of control and the bugs started to corrupt the world.
[[And they tell me to fight against them?]]

links.name: And they tell me to fight against them?
links.link: And they tell me to fight against them?

passages.text:
Exactly.
You  achieved your goal of exterminate the bugs.
But there was consequences.
[[…->.2]]
passages.name: And they tell me to fight against them?

passages.text:
In your last fight, you where against the most terryfing bug.
It was such a hard battle, that after that, your respawn power didn’t work proprely
[[But if I killed all bugs, why they are back?]]

links.name: But if I killed all bugs, why they are back?
links.link: But if I killed all bugs, why they are back?

passages.text:
Seems like something bring they.
I don’t know what, but we must discovery!
[[You're right!->IA]]
[[I don’t know...->IA]]
passages.name: But if I killed all bugs, why they are back?

passages.name: END
